About.paragraph: Our company is based on human connections, a long-lost trait most other companies lack. Here at Digital Reign, we consolidated a uniquely balanced formula of great employee relations and efficient quality work. Being a veteran owned business once on the frontlines; now covering your six and keeping you safe.
About.paragraph2: At Digital Reign throughout the years, we have devised the most timeless practice to keep your business and data safety. Currently compliance has been the focus of organizations in the US and across the world, while sacrificing operational security. We try our best to compensate for both; compliance, without compromising real time security.

Features_revamp.paragraph: Through years of experience, our team at Digital Reign has devised a sophisticated approach to keep your data safe, support daily IT operations and maintain set forth compliance. Attaining framework compliance has been the focus of organizations in the US and across the world, while sacrificing operational security. Here at Digital Reign both; implementing compliance and upkeeping with real time security are second nature to us.

Services.name: Infrastructure support
Services.text: We also provide state of the art infrastructure support including ITIL -DevOPs, IT HelpdeskServers & Databases maintenance, Lifecycle (system upgrades)

Services.name: Cyber Security
Services.text: our cyber security products include and is not limited to compliance audits, Continuous Monitoring, Vulnerability management, and Cyber awareness training.

Services.name: Compliance
Services.text: Pen testing is also one of our specialties here we offer Internal, External, Phishing, SEWireless, WebApp,Mobile

Services.name: Cloud Support
Services.text: At digital Reign we provide a variety of cloud services such as AWS, Azure, Compliance, Migration, Hybrid solutions, Test environment
